Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Ineffective \In`ef*fect"ive\, a. [Pref. in- not + effective: cf. F. ineffectif.] Not effective; not having the desired effect; ineffectual; futile; inefficient; useless; as, an ineffective appeal; an ineffective herbal remedy. [1913 Webster +PJC]
The word of God, without the spirit, [is] a dead and ineffective letter. --Jer. Taylor. [1913 Webster]
